posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
My AB balancing adventures with the Pale Master class continues!


This time I have created a Dex-based Elven Archer Tank.


To tank for your party.


Yes  - elf - archer  - to tank for the party...




Arcane archer to pump that AB to a very acceptable level (I got it to Base 45 AB). Up to 6 APR / round with haste and rapid shot. 

Rest of the stat points into constitution to get the HP nice and high

Pale Master makes this dude crit and sneak attack immune

Its has a silly amount of AC naked, like 43 AC with EMA, with no items

No uncanny dodge though, I don't think PM has that ability

It's got Taunt to lower enemy's AC so your teammates can whack em, if they are silly enough to come into melee range.

Called Shot too, to shoot their legs so they are crawling with a low AC from all that negative dexterity you are dishing out (heh up to -12 negative dex / round, if you hit all those called shots)

If you get in trouble you have the Epic Warding spell to help you out

Heh I wanted lots of skill points with those elven keen senses

Theres a handful of these archer tank builds sitting in the archives:
SpoilerPaleMaster Archer bard 5 / arcane archer 19 / pale master 16 (elf) by evo_dragon Lesser Undead Artillery bard 5 / pale master 16 / arcane archer 19 (half-elf) by GhostNWN

With nearly 500 HP this is a very silly elven melee archer tank build that might just work!

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Hmmm...no heavy armor to help with that loss of Dex AC because there is no Uncanny Dodge - and firing a bow in melee gets AoO - if this build gets surrounded, it's gonna get mashed! I don't see it being too tanky!  EW is going to carry it for awhile, but then...it's 1/day.

No Str for Mighty, no WS/EWS to add any extra damage.

AA levels are a bit low to make up for this.

But it is a beefy plinker.
